de.sciss.swingosc
Class AbstractResponder

java.lang.Object
  de.sciss.swingosc.AbstractResponder
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionResponder, AsyncResponder, ChangeResponder, ComponentResponder, DocumentResponder, KeyResponder, ListResponder, MouseResponder, SoundFileViewResponder, WindowResponder
public abstract class AbstractResponder
extends Object

Superclass of different event responders. This handles the listener registration / unregistration using java reflection.

Version:
0.40, 25-Mar-06
Author:
Hanns Holger Rutz
Todo:
could be much more efficent if the getter methods would only be looked up once!
